## Types
| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| Body fossil | Remains of organism |
| Trace fossil | Tracks, burrows |
| Mold/Cast | Impression/fill |
| Amber | Preserved in resin |
| Frozen | Ice preservation |

## Index Fossils
- Widespread, short-lived
- Used for dating

slides.title: Dating Methods
slides.content:
# Dating Methods ðŸ“…

## Relative Dating
- Superposition: Older below
- Cross-cutting: Intrusions younger

## Absolute Dating
| Method | Half-life | Use |
|--------|-----------|-----|
| C-14 | 5,730 yr | <50,000 yr |
| K-Ar | 1.3 billion | Older rocks |
| U-Pb | 4.5 billion | Very old |
